short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tidy your sql on the fly, it's free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant SQL formatter is a tool that allows you to easily format messy and unorganized SQL into a clean, well-structured script. Instead of manually reformatting each SQL indentation.

Instant SQL formatter can create an organized and legible script with just one hotkey. This software currently provides more than 100 formatting options, and many more are in development. It has never been so easy to get your favorite SQL layout!

Instant SQL formatter can also generate well-formatted and colored SQL scripts in HTML or RTF that can be used on the web, blogs, forums, articles or books.

In addition to beautifying SQL codes, Instant SQL formatter can quickly convert between SQL and C#, Java, VB, PHP, Delphi and other programming languages, cutting down the time used to debug SQL.
